product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Survival Reflect Blanket - Special Buy
long_description: Ultralight and compact, it's easy to keep the Ultimate Survival Technologies Survival Reflect Blanket in your pack for a little extra insurance during your backcountry adventures. Waterproof, reflective material helps conserve up to 90% of body heat; fabric is also lightweight, fire-retardant and easy to pack. Ultimate Survival Technologies Survival Reflect Blanket measures 83 x 52 in. when laid flat. Special buy.
short_description: Ultralight and compact, it's easy to keep the Ultimate Survival Technologies Survival Reflect Blanket in your pack for a little extra insurance during your backcountry adventures.
